com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.datalink.threadmanager

Class ThreadServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.datalink.threadmanager.ThreadServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ThreadServer
extends java.lang.Thread

    This class allows to start and manage the client threads. It is also responsible to manage the connection/communication with remote devices.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThreadServer

        public ThreadServer(android.os.Handler handler,
                    short nbThreads,
                    boolean verbose,
                    boolean secure,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    android.bluetooth.BluetoothAdapter mAdapter,
                    java.util.UUID uuid,
                    ListSocketDevice listSocketDevice)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        handler - a Handler object which allows to send and process Message and Runnable objects associated with a thread's.
        nbThreads - a short value to determine the number of threads managed by the server.
        verbose - a boolean value to set the debug/verbose mode.
        secure - a boolean value to determine if the connection is secure.
        name - a String value which represents the connection's name.
        mAdapter - a BluetoothAdapter object which represents the local device Bluetooth adapter.
        uuid - an UUID object which identify the physical device.
        listSocketDevice - a listSocketDevice object which contains the clients managed by the threadPool.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.

      • ThreadServer

        public ThreadServer(android.os.Handler handler,
                    short nbThreads,
                    boolean verbose,
                    int port,
                    ListSocketDevice listSocketDevice)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        handler - a Handler object which allows to send and process Message and Runnable objects associated with a thread's.
        nbThreads - a short value to determine the number of threads managed by the server.
        verbose - a boolean value to set the debug/verbose mode.
        port - an integer value to set the listening port number.
        listSocketDevice - a listSocketDevice object which contains the clients managed by the threadPool.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.

      • getActiveConnexion

        public java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,SocketManager> getActiveConnexion()
        Method allowing to return the active connections managed by the server.
        Returns:
        a ConcurrentHashMap which maps a remote device with a SocketManager (socket).
